pageContext.public_note: Search course ID: 7697 - or sign up for our Full Day camp combining Movie-Making with Jedi Master Engineering in the morning; search course ID: 7876 for that Full Day option!
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Learn how to bring your Jedi LEGO速 creations to life!  Create skits and plots, learn how to make storyboards for planning scenes,  build intricate LEGO速 sets and characters from tens of thousands of LEGO速 pieces,  photograph using digital cameras and homemade tripods, and learn how to animate and edit footage on computers (also adding voices and sound effects)! At the end of class, students receive animations either on DVD or through internet sharing!
pageContext.course_type_name: Jedi Stop-Motion Movie Making with LEGO速 Materials
